net.seninp.jmotif.sax.datastructures

Class SAXRecords

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.seninp.jmotif.sax.datastructures.SAXRecords
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<SaxRecord>

    public class SAXRecords
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<SaxRecord>
    The collection for SAXRecords. This datastructure is used in the parallel SAX implementation.
    Author:
    psenin
